item.title: Building with Go
item.description: This refers to compiling .go programs to .exe or other binary On Windows: go build main.go Compiles it and its dependencies If you would like to compile your entire project package go build Does that! If you would like to cross compile set GOOS=linux set GOOS=amd64 go build If you are on PowerShell:...

item.title: Goroutines
item.description: Goroutines allow concurrency in Go. Essentially, it tells Go that a function must be run asynchronously.

item.title: polygenic risk score
item.description: TLDR? A polygenic risk score (PRS) is a way to estimate an individualâ€™s genetic predisposition to a certain trait or disease by combining the effects of many genetic variants across the genome.

item.title: REGENIE (Complete)
item.description: What it is Essentially, it is a tool that allows you to test GWAS signals/genetic instrument associations while accounting for ancestry.

item.title: bed file format
item.description: The .bed format is a binary file format that can be generated using Plink2.
